item.title: Bellator 281: MVP vs. Storley
item.description:

Main Event: Michael Page (20-1-0) vs. Logan Storley (13-1-0) Co-Main Event: Lyoto Machida (26-11-0) vs. Fabian Edwards (9-2-0) Main Card: Denise Kielholtz (6-3-0) vs. Kana Watanabe (10-1-1) Main Card: Paul Daley (43-18-2) vs. Wendell Giácomo (9-2-0) Main Card: Luke Trainer (5-0-0) vs. Simon Biyong (7-2-0) Prelim: Daniel Weichel (41-13-0) vs. Robert Whiteford (16-4-0) Prelim: Oliver Enkamp (10-3-0) vs. Mark Lemminger (12-4-0) Prelim: Kate Jackson (11-5-1) vs. Elina Kallionidou (8-4-0) Prelim: Alfie Davis (14-4-0) vs. Tim Wilde (14-4-0) Prelim: Andrew Fisher (18-8-1) vs. Attila Korkmaz (12-6-0) Prelim: Charlie Ward (9-4-0) vs. Alan Carlos (13-9-0) Prelim: Lee Chadwick (27-15-1) vs. Maciej Różański (13-3-0) Prelim: Chiara Penco (6-3-0) vs. Lanchana Green (4-4-1)
